record.field: Daily Attendance Report - Morning (12:00 PM Israel)

field.name: nextcall
field.eval: (DateTime.now().astimezone(pytz.timezone('Asia/Jerusalem')).replace(hour=12, minute=0, second=0, microsecond=0) + timedelta(days=1 if DateTime.now().astimezone(pytz.timezone('Asia/Jerusalem')).hour >= 12 else 0)).astimezone(pytz.utc).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')

record.field: Daily Attendance Report - Evening (7:00 PM Israel)

field.name: nextcall
field.eval: (DateTime.now().astimezone(pytz.timezone('Asia/Jerusalem')).replace(hour=19, minute=0, second=0, microsecond=0) + timedelta(days=1 if DateTime.now().astimezone(pytz.timezone('Asia/Jerusalem')).hour >= 19 else 0)).astimezone(pytz.utc).strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
